TunableList.name: _elements
TunableList.description: The list of elements in the dynamic enumeration.

TunableList.name: GROUPS
TunableList.description: A mapping between Groups for trait statistics and the maximum number of traits that are allowed to be unlocked for that group.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The trait statistic group to limit.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The maximum number of trait statistics in this group that can be in either the unlocked or at risk states. When this cap is reached all other trait statistics in the group will only be allowed to have their value change towards the default value of the statistic.
